task_name: Configure Facility and Company Master Data
description: Set up facility US7F (Summerville, South Carolina) and business units GERBER and Intradeco in Deposco User Interface. Configure facility address and operational parameters.
comments: Facility setup in progress, business unit configuration pending

task_name: Upload Location, Zone, and Storage Master Data
description: Configure all warehouse locations including Receiving, Returns, Damages, Autostore, Reserve, Full Cases B2B zone, Split Case/Eaches B2B zone, and Shipping locations. Set up zones and storage records with min/max thresholds.
comments: Location master data upload via Data Exchange in progress

description: Build field mapping templates and establish SFTP connectors for bidirectional data flow with SAP including items, trading partners, purchase orders, ASNs, customer orders, receipts, and ship notifications.
comments: SFTP connections established, field mappings in development

task_name: Develop Autostore Integration with Swisslog API
description: Build socket interface integration with Autostore via Swisslog API for item synchronization, pick wave communication, pick confirmations, replenishment notifications, and inventory adjustments.
comments: API documentation review complete, development in progress

task_name: Configure Item Master Data and Pack Types
description: Set up item master data structure supporting multiple pack types (Each and Case) per SKU, configure UPC relationships for trading partner specific vs generic SKUs, and establish item components for virtual bundles.
comments: Item structure defined, pack configuration in progress

description: Set up ASN Receiving and Returns Receiving handheld processes with over-receiving tolerances, container scanning, and quality control workflows. Configure receiving locations and putaway logic.

Set up Post Order Import logic, Pick Wave Profiles, Order Release Profiles for different order types (B2B Full Cases, B2B Eaches, B2C Singles/Multis, Special Embroidery, Virtual Bundles). Configure cartonization at wave for applicable order types.
comments: POI logic design complete, wave profiles in development

description: Set up printer assignments, resources, and label templates including SSCC labels for 34+ trading partners, shipping labels, packing slips, BOL, item labels, and special instruction labels for embroidery orders.
comments: Base templates configured, trading partner specific labels in progress

description: Conduct comprehensive UAT covering all inbound processes (receiving, putaway), inventory management (cycle counts, adjustments, replenishments), outbound processes (waving, picking, packing, shipping), and integration touchpoints.
comments: UAT planning in progress, test scenarios being defined

description: Set up cycle count profiles and schedules, inventory adjustment reason codes, replenishment logic with storage min/max thresholds, and directed replenishment for Autostore zone including demand-based replenishment.
comments: Cycle count configuration complete, replenishment logic in progress
